CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery Premium-Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
CurrentVersion.description: Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery Premium-Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
OldVersion.description: Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
OldVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery premium: Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
CurrentVersion.description: Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery premium: Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
OldVersion.description: Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Activity Explorer - Limiting sensitive data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Activity Explorer - Limiting sensitive data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
OldVersion.description: With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC environment.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC
OldVersion.description: We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC environment.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: eSignature sequential signing
CurrentVersion.description: Sequential signing enables the creator of an eSignature request to specify the sequence of recipients. The document is first signed by the initial recipient in the sequence, then forwarded to the subsequent recipient for their signature. This process continues in the designated order until every recipient has added their signature. Once everyone has signed, the signed document is made available to all involved.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: eSignature sequential signing
OldVersion.description: Sequential signing enables the creator of an eSignature request to specify the sequence of recipients. The document is first signed by the initial recipient in the sequence, then forwarded to the subsequent recipient for their signature. This process continues in the designated order until every recipient has added their signature. Once everyone has signed, the signed document is made available to all involved.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Go to folder shortcut in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When focused on the folder pane, users can now press CTRL + Y to quickly navigate to a folder. Simply press the first letter of the folder name to move focus directly to that folder. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Go to folder shortcut in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: When focused on the folder pane, users can now press CTRL + Y to quickly navigate to a folder. Simply press the first letter of the folder name to move focus directly to that folder. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Be notified about new form responses on Lists
CurrentVersion.description: Lists forms users can subscribe to be notified of new responses on their forms. By default, this would be toggled off, but a form collaborator can toggle on and receive an email notification for every new response on that form after.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Schedule turning on and off responses to forms
CurrentVersion.description: List form owners and collaborators can schedule specific dates and times to start and stop accepting responses. The form will be active during the designated period and will automatically stop accepting responses once the scheduled end time is reached.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Add attachments to forms
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add attachment fields to enhance their list forms. This feature allows users to upload files directly to the form, providing additional context or necessary documentation.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Conditional branching in Microsoft Lists forms
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists forms will enable users to create dynamic forms featuring branching and conditional logic. This update allows users to customize their forms to display relevant questions based on conditions applied to previous responses, empowering them to design smarter forms that adapt to their data collection needs.
